content: update 15/8/25 there is an improved version of this pattern available in this bundle https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/10-beginner-granny-squares-bundle update 21/4/23 there are now right and left handed youtube tutorials to accompany this pattern that i have linked here right handed - https //youtu be/wkmvqtw1dqm left handed - https //youtu be/d34icawkryk please note there are two different pdfs available for this pattern - one for uk terms and one for us terms make sure you are downloading the one you want this is a simple pattern for a solid granny square to accompany my tiktok tutorials that are linked in the pattern this is a versatile motif that can be used in a variety of projects including blankets cushions clothing and accessories
